section.title: Spelling errors with only incorrect suggestions (17)
True negatives (589)
section.p: The correctly accepted words are listed here for easy copy&paste into Word to quick check regressions in new versions of the speller: No correctly spelled words accepted by an earlier speller should be rejected by later spellers. To check, just copy and paste these words to Word, and see if you get any red underlines. Duplicate words are not repeated, unless one is followed by some punctuation. The words are sorted according to Unicode character code.
